page.title: 05Housing in OLD
page.content: Old is a small village of approximately 500 .It has several large houses built of{ironstone.}Many of the small farm cottages of the past have been modernised and extended to create large and comfortable homes.Some barns have also been converted.There are few houses that have been built since the 1945 War and little modern housing,except for six old folks bungalows constructed in the last 10 years. The population has increased over the last 15 years due mainly to people moving from towns to be part of a 'village community'.It is these people who have improved the old properties. There seems to be a division between the 'new' arrivals and the those who have been in the village all there lives (oldest a lady of 84).
